title: A list of the lent-preachers appointed to preach before His Majesty, for the year 1680/81
author: Royal Chapel of Whitehall (London, England)
publisher: Printed for Samuel Mearne, Stationer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,
notes: Imprint place from Mearne's location in 1681; imprint year from Wing.

"Lent-preachers appointed by the Lord Bishop of London, to preach on Wednesdays and Fridays for the year 1680/81", which is contiguous and may have been intended to be published separately, has imprint: Printed for Samuel Mearne, Stationer to the Kings most excellent Majesty.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
